meanings.definition: Of or relating to a visitor or visitation.
meanings.sent1: The hotel staff prepared the visitatorial room for the important guest.
meanings.sent2: The museum provided a visitatorial guide for the tourists.
meanings.sent3: The visitatorial cat greeted each visitor with a friendly meow.
meanings.sent4: The visitatorial clouds covered the sky like a blanket of welcome.
meanings.sent5: The visitatorial atmosphere in the park made everyone feel invited.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to an official visit or inspection.
meanings.sent1: The visitatorial team arrived to conduct the inspection of the factory.
meanings.sent2: The government official's visitatorial duties included checking the facilities.
meanings.sent3: The visitatorial penguin inspected the fish market with a serious expression.
meanings.sent4: The visitatorial eyes of the auditor scrutinized every detail of the report.
meanings.sent5: The visitatorial visit brought a sense of formality to the office.

meanings.definition: Acting in the capacity of a visitor or inspector.
meanings.sent1: The visitatorial role required the volunteer to welcome guests at the event.
meanings.sent2: The visitatorial position involved observing and reporting any issues.
meanings.sent3: The visitatorial squirrel peeked into the garden to see the new flowers.
meanings.sent4: The visitatorial wind whispered secrets as it passed through the town.
meanings.sent5: The visitatorial presence added a sense of curiosity to the gathering.
